secondary.description: Determines if 'secondary' CSS class should be applied.

disabled.description: Determines if button should be disabled.

ghost.description: Determines if 'ghost' CSS should be applied.

propertiesSummary.name: id
propertiesSummary.text: Component id. Must be unique for each component in a plugin.

propertiesSummary.name: category
propertiesSummary.text: Component category. Currently, only @iota/core category is supported.

propertiesSummary.name: children
propertiesSummary.text: Component children. If both 'content' & 'children' are passed, 'children' takes precedence

propertiesSummary.name: content
propertiesSummary.text: Component content. If 'children' property is passed, this property will be ignored

propertiesSummary.name: secondary
propertiesSummary.text: When true, 'secondary' CSS class should be applied.

propertiesSummary.name: disabled
propertiesSummary.text: When true, the component will be disabled.

propertiesSummary.name: ghost
propertiesSummary.text: When true, 'ghost' CSS class should be applied.
